typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SK_OpportunityProductid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_OpportunityProductid as string,
		productid as string,
		opportunityid as string,
		amount as decimal(19,4),
		priceunit as decimal(19,4),
		quantity as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> STG
source(output(
		SK_OpportunityProductid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_OpportunityProductid as string,
		productid as string,
		opportunityid as string,
		amount as decimal(19,4),
		priceunit as decimal(19,4),
		quantity as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DWH
STG derive(RAWHASH = crc32(512,toInteger(toString(extendedamount),'############'),toInteger(toString(priceperunit),'############'),toInteger(toString(quantity),'####'))) ~> CrearHASH
CrearHASH, DWH lookup(upper(opportunityproductid) == DWH@BK_OpportunityProductid,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(DWH@HASHKEY),
	DWH@HASHKEY != RAWHASH,
	disjoint: false) ~> Split@(Nuevos, Actualizaciones, Nada)
Split@Nuevos alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> Insertar
Split@Actualizaciones alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> Actualizar
Insertar sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SK_OpportunityProductid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_OpportunityProductid as string,
		productid as string,
		opportunityid as string,
		amount as decimal(19,4),
		priceunit as decimal(19,4),
		quantity as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		HASHKEY = RAWHASH,
		BK_OpportunityProductid = opportunityproductid,
		productid = Split@Nuevos@productid,
		opportunityid = Split@Nuevos@opportunityid,
		amount = extendedamount,
		priceunit = priceperunit,
		quantity = Split@Nuevos@quantity,
		modifiedon = Split@Nuevos@modifiedon
	)) ~> Nuevos
Actualizar sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SK_OpportunityProductid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_OpportunityProductid as string,
		productid as string,
		opportunityid as string,
		amount as decimal(19,4),
		priceunit as decimal(19,4),
		quantity as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['BK_OpportunityProductid'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		HASHKEY = RAWHASH,
		BK_OpportunityProductid = opportunityproductid,
		productid = Split@Actualizaciones@productid,
		opportunityid = Split@Actualizaciones@opportunityid,
		amount = extendedamount,
		priceunit = priceperunit,
		quantity = Split@Actualizaciones@quantity,
		modifiedon = Split@Actualizaciones@modifiedon
	)) ~> Actualizaciones
